title: What song, possibly from the 80s, has a chorus that says something like 'can you feel it' and has a saxophone straight after matching the melody, which repeats a couple of times? - Quora

response.answer_text: Pretty sure it’s “You Belong to the City” by Glenn Frey. If that’s not it, comment and I’ll double check. Edited to add a better video:
Isn’t it “What A Feeling” by Irene Cara? No saxophone, though. Irene Cara - What A Feeling (1983)
